column6: ANSWERS AT ALL COSTS. - In the wake of last issue's explosion of secrets, the heroes of the Marvel U are reeling, leaving Nick Fury to stand alone. - He Who Holds the Eye is still on the run, and now we meet his boss, the villainous mastermind behind the raid on the Watcher's lair. - And in deep space, the Winter Soldier leads a team that uncovers the most bizarre murder of all.
column8: | writer:Jason Aaron | artist:Mike Deodato | penciller (cover):Julian Totino Tedesco
